name: BroFighters
description:
welcome to Bro Fighters! A pixel game where you fight another player to the death with only 5 hearts, who will win? while you're fighting, you will have to watch out for spikes, hot bottom platforms and lava! with 7 levels, you can fight your friend for about 10 minutes till you run out of levels to play :/ but don't worry, this is still in development, you may ask what is there going to be?

There's going to be more levels of course, but not just any levels, better ones with enemy's, boss fights, upgrades and more! so stay tone by following me or checking our youtube channel out(here it is: The Verhonkadonx - YouTube)

hope you guys enjoy!

BY: Blockhead manic
